Entry.JapaneseText: ここの山小屋で休もうヨ。 疲れた体で山道を歩いても、危険なだけだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Let's rest in this hostel. Traversing a mountain when you're tuckered out is risky business.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>の言う通りだ。 途中でケガをしたら、元も子もないからな。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao> is right. If you wind up injuring yourself, then this will have all been for naught.
